source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static shot of a dimly lit entryway. A dark wooden door is slightly ajar, with a sliver of light shining from underneath. The scene is still, with no discernible motion from any subjects.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: This is a smooth, eye-level shot that dollies forward toward the front door.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The video features a smooth, eye-level dolly shot that moves forward towards the front door.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The video features a smooth, eye-level dolly shot that moves forward towards the front door.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This video features a smooth, eye-level dolly shot that moves forward towards a dimly lit entryway. A dark wooden door is slightly ajar, with a sliver of light shining from underneath, creating a sense of anticipation as the camera glides towards it.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video features a smooth, eye-level dolly shot that moves forward towards a dimly lit entryway. A dark wooden door is slightly ajar, with a sliver of light shining from underneath, creating a sense of anticipation as the camera glides towards it.

bad_caption: A cyclist pedals quickly along a sunlit path, weaving between orange traffic cones. As the camera follows from behind, the cyclist rings a bell and then turns sharply to avoid a group of pedestrians crossing the path.
